QuestData.Title: The Missing Link
QuestData.Description:
<Though burned, portions of the note in the architect's hand remain legible.>
They are... everywhere... disguised...
Encrypted... blueprints...
Cipher...
Pontus... watching me...
<The cipher must be needed to read the ship blueprints. It seems Pontus is the likely holder.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Our best chance at recovering the cipher.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Architect's Cipher from Tideguard Pontus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Take the cipher to Samuel Williams at Seafarer's Rest.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need to get to the bottom of all this before Lord Stormsong goes on the offensive!
QuestData.RewardText: A cipher? Of course! But by the great sea, what's it covered in?!
